mapper.select: SELECT st.cont_code contCode FROM t_schedule_job sj LEFT JOIN t_schedule_task st ON sj.task_id = st.id WHERE sj.id = #{jobId}
SELECT consignor_name consignorName FROM t_schedule_job sj LEFT JOIN t_sample_task st ON sj.id = st.job_id where st.id = #{taskId,jdbcType = BIGINT}
SELECT count( sj.id ) cnt FROM t_schedule_job sj WHERE sj.organ_id = #{organId} and sj.job_status != 0 AND DATE_FORMAT( sj.create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m' );
SELECT count( sj.id ) cnt FROM t_schedule_job sj WHERE sj.organ_id = #{organId} and sj.job_status != 0 AND YEAR ( sj.create_time ) = YEAR ( NOW() )

SELECT city, count(*) taskNum FROM ( SELECT sj.id infoId, sr.simple_name city FROM t_schedule_job sj LEFT JOIN t_sys_region sr ON sj.city = sr.region_code WHERE sj.organ_id = #{organId} AND DATE_FORMAT(sj.create_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') ) b GROUP BY city
